item.title: Waju
item.description: Waju or whatever is called is a game that until this day I don’t know from where it comes. But, is fun. Edit: The game is based on a German game called Mensch Ã¤rgere Dich nicht Goal The goal of the game is very simple: Move your marbles for one lap from your home to your goal. Don’t worry about winning but don’t let anyone else win. Have fun.
